Package entity.livings

Class LivingBeing

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Entity
      • entity.PhysicalEntity
        • entity.Being
          • entity.livings.LivingBeing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Monster, Player
    public abstract class LivingBeing
extends Being
implements Updatable
    A being that requires death and respawn logic. Death and respawn has 2 phases: Dying phase: player just died, is frozen and rendered with getDyingSprite(). Spawning phase: player moved to spawn, rendered with getAliveSprite(), but still frozen.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private double dyingTime
      Time until this living being is respawned.
      private Direction facing
      Direction that this living being is going.
      private boolean isDying
      Whether or not this being is in its dying phase (frozen at the location of death and rendered with getDyingSprite()
      private boolean isSpawning
      Whether or not this being is in its spawning phase (frozen at the spawn location and rendered normally)
      private double spawningTime
      Time until this living being gets its death lock removed.
      private Tile spawnTile
      Position that living being spawns.

      • Fields inherited from class entity.Being

        halfSize

      Set spawn tile, size, and direction of this being.

        Time until this living being is respawned.

        private double spawningTime
        Time until this living being gets its death lock removed.

        private boolean isDying
        Whether or not this being is in its dying phase (frozen at the location of death and rendered with getDyingSprite()

      • LivingBeing

        protected LivingBeing​(Tile spawnTile,
                      double size,
                      Direction direction)
        Set spawn tile, size, and direction of this being.
        Parameters:
        spawnTile - Position that living being spawns.
        size - Size of this being.
        direction - Direction that this living being is going.

    • Method Detail

      • getFacing

        public Direction getFacing()
        Returns:
        Direction that this living being is going.

      • setFacing

        public void setFacing​(Direction facing)
        Set direction that this living being is going.
        Parameters:
        facing - Direction that this living being is going.

      • update

        public void update​(double ticksPassed)
        Follow the game clock to time and progress the phases.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Updatable
        Parameters:
        ticksPassed - Frame rate

      • die

        public void die()
        Make this living being die. Set isDying true, calls onDeath(), and start the dying phase that lasts 0.5 seconds.

      • respawn

        private void respawn()
        Respawn this being. Ends the dying phase and starts the respawning phase that lasts for getSpawnCooldown().

      • live

        private void live()
        Once fully alive (i.e. out of spawning phase), call onAlive().

      • onDeath

        protected abstract void onDeath()
        To be called immediately upon death.

      • onSpawn

        protected abstract void onSpawn()
        To be called upon spawn (that is when moving from dying phase to spawning phase).

      • onAlive

        protected abstract void onAlive()
        To be called when fully alive (out of spawning phase).

      • getSprite

        public Sprite getSprite()
        Select the sprite to render based on which phase this being is on (getDyingSprite() if dying phase, getAliveSprite() otherwise).
        Specified by:
        getSprite in class PhysicalEntity
        Returns:
        The sprite to render.

      • getAliveSprite

        protected abstract Sprite getAliveSprite()
        Get the sprite to render when this being is alive.
        Returns:
        The sprite to render when this being is alive.

      • getDyingSprite

        protected abstract Sprite getDyingSprite()
        Get the sprite to render when this being is dying.
        Returns:
        The sprite to render when this being is dying.

      • getSpawnCooldown

        protected double getSpawnCooldown()
        Get the amount of time this being should stay frozen in spawning phase. Defaults to 0 but can be overriden by subclasses.
        Returns:
        Cooldown time it takes to resapwn.

      • isDead

        protected boolean isDead()
        Check if it is dead or not. Being is considered dead if it is in either dying phase OR spawning phase.
        Returns:
        true if it is dead. Otherwise, false.
